title: CompTIA A+ Certification
description: Complete A+ certification course covering hardware, software, networking, and troubleshooting. Prepare for CompTIA A+ 220-1101 and 220-1102 exams.

instructor.name: LEARN-IT-ALL Team
instructor.bio: Expert IT professionals with years of certification training experience

chapters.title: Chapter 1: Mobile Devices
chapters.description: Laptop hardware, mobile device connectivity, and accessories

chapters.title: Chapter 2: Networking
chapters.description: TCP/IP, wireless networking, network types, and cable standards

chapters.title: Chapter 3: Hardware
chapters.description: PC components, peripherals, power supplies, and cooling systems

chapters.title: Chapter 4: Virtualization and Cloud Computing
chapters.description: Virtual machines, cloud services, and deployment models

chapters.title: Chapter 5: Hardware and Network Troubleshooting
chapters.description: Diagnostic procedures, common hardware issues, and solutions

chapters.title: Chapter 6: Operating Systems
chapters.description: Windows, Linux, macOS features, installation, and administration

chapters.title: Chapter 7: Security
chapters.description: Physical security, logical security, malware prevention, and best practices

chapters.title: Chapter 8: Software Troubleshooting
chapters.description: OS issues, application problems, and common error messages

chapters.title: Chapter 9: Operational Procedures
chapters.description: Safety, environmental impacts, communication, and documentation

chapters.title: Chapter 10: Exam Preparation
chapters.description: Practice exams, review strategies, and test-taking tips

learningObjectives: Install and configure PC components and peripherals
Understand networking fundamentals and wireless technologies
Support mobile devices and their connectivity
Work with virtualization and cloud computing
Follow operational procedures and safety guidelines
Pass CompTIA A+ 220-1101 and 220-1102 certification exams
